title: Motul M2 Helmet Interior Cleaner
features: Antibacterial formula kills 99.9% of odor-causing bacteria
Safe for all helmet liner materials
description: Keep your helmet fresh and hygienic with Motul M2 Interior Cleaner. The antibacterial formula penetrates helmet liner fibers to eliminate sweat buildup, odors, and bacteria. Safe for all materials including Coolmax, Alveotech, and removable liners. Simply spray, let it sit for 60 seconds, and air dry.
